for the first time in my life i understand what u mean coz i tried to seed my request das boot for 4-5 days. first day i was seeding to 50+ peers.second too. but the seeds were never more than 15 at any point. later it just sucked the seeds never showed up and peers came down to 10 and settled.
what im saying is  that if people seeded on the first days then the torrent would have been more popular and the people who come from the search engine later( those who just  type the movie and look for the options and get a well seeded one) would def gets urs and u know so on..

can u plZ. tell me wir can i find ip man 1, i have no idea if u had it in some package.. i want linKs for Yip Man (2008) http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1220719/

@tylr: I still have BluRays of both IP man movies, but I cannot every few months rip same movies over and over again - I've been thinking that I made that (and myself) clear about that few days back.

Point being, I cannot do re-rippings next three-four weeks for sure.

Be patient, focus on something else or - find appropriate encodes all around. If you Google, you would find more than three-four dozens of IP 1&2 in sizes from 300 MB - 8.75 GB. I know that for sure.

And yes - I can upload with 27400 kB/s and download even faster, but I use that for sharing only, every day I seed at least 50 GB and most people would need whole month for that.

I use my resources for common good only and for that reason I hardly can accept "facts of life" knowing the nature of the people but trying to push them beyond complex limits around them.
Finally a movie about somebody's life that is more f*cked up than my own.  I think I'll pass on this one.  Still seeding the Looney Tunes torrents, though.
